bug.author: znation
bug.description: Repro steps: import turicreate as tc sf = tc.SFrame.read_csv('https://docs-assets.developer.apple.com/turicreate/datasets/tc-clang-format-results.csv') sf.show() Expected: One scrollbar on the right. Actual: Two scrollbars on the right. The inner one seems disabled. See screenshot. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5673251/36623271-f9a7dc90-18b7-11e8-9d6e-9a286044223d.png></denchmark-link>
